VERSATILE FIT: This YTX20L-BS battery fits in a variety of applications, ranging from motorcycles, ATVs, jet skis, and more

TOP TECHNOLOGY: The Acid inside is constructed with Absorbed Glass Mat technology allowing for a low-maintenance and spill proof battery. Patented sealed post prevents corrosion, which gives extended battery life
EASY APPLICATION: Chrome Battery batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered. Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go

body.description: Chrome Battery presents YTX2L-BS sealed AGM batteries, the precision power solution. Each battery is constructed with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat technology that allows for a complete maintenance-free and high-performance operation. Chrome Battery features improvements in the longevity, warranty, returns, and shipping over our other brands; Pirate and Zipp. All YTX2L-BS Chrome Battery brand AGM batteries are manufactured with the highest quality materials and rigorously tested to ensure safety, OEM compatibility, effectiveness, and optimal performance. YTX2L-BS is a 12V 27CCA High Performance Sealed AGM Battery. YTX2L-BS has AGM Separators for superior design and durability.YTX2L-BS Battery Features: No spills, no leaks, and no water to check. Extreme vibration resistance to ensure maximum conductivity. High Cranking Amps & Low Self-Discharge Rate. Fully charged, ready for immediate use. Fits in a variety of applications, ranging from motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, jet skis, snowmobiles, scooters and more. YTX2L-BS AGM Battery Specifications: Model: YTX2L-BS Dimensions: (H) 6.1" x (L) 6.89" (W) 3.43" Weight: 13.7 lbs.Volts: 12V Polarity: [- +]Condition: New. Also Replaces: MTX2L-BS, UTX2L-BS, UB2L-BS, YTX2L-BS, 2L-BS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased three of these. I have waited to post a review as several motorcycle batteries I have purchased worked great for a couple of months, then they flatlined. The oldest is almost a year, then 6 months, and a month. So far, no problems from any of them. It was sized for my 4-wheeler, the other two, the size wasn't an issue, so I just bought the same one. One runs a winch on a trailer, and the other one is running a gate controller. Both of these are on solar chargers. They all maintain charge well. UPDATE: I would estimate that they are dying between 2-3 years each. I have replaced two of them. Normally, that would not rate five stars, but since these are the only motorcycle batteries that I have ever had that lasted longer than a year... 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brand of battery
reviews.reviewText: I ran it on the trickle charger for a day after it arrived and this thing has not let me down once. Powerful and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad. Great price.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great battery for the price.I would've given 5 stars if the posts were tapped and threaded.Not going to lie... instead of a tapped post, you have to work with a small nut that slides behind the post, and this added about 20 frustrating minutes to the install.However... for around 50 bucks... it was worth it.It came properly charged, and I have started my bike a few dozen times with it.It still cranks as strong as it did on the first start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only lasted a year in jet ski
reviews.reviewText: Battery only lasted one year. I installed in jet ski last spring and put on smart trickle charger all winter only to find it was completely dead this spring. Definitely disappointed but hopefully this is a rare case sometimes you get a dud battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a cheap battery. The terminals leave a lot to be desired. Hope this one lasts for at least the summer in the wifes bike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Just perfect. Ordered on Monday and received on Thursday. Perfectly packaged with no damages. I installed it on my Harley and it fired up first time. Just checked it after no use for eight days and it fired up first go. Great battery and a great service. I will purchase a spare for that great price.
